pages.text: Hysteria is a classical $(marked)Primed$() Rite which will release a mania-inducing wave once triggered.

The caster should try to stay at a distance, unless they want to risk a short rush of madness.$(br)Any Great Old One may be addressed. Any villager or player will activate this. $(br2)$(o)Hysteria requires a lesser amount of focal power; the power within the Altar and a few candles should be enough.$()
